---
name: Feature request
about: Request a Feature, Module, Improvement
title: "[Feature]"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**Is it a core feature, a new module or a module change request**
Core feature being part of the background system, code, layout, etc
Module being what you see / add on the dashboard

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Is there an example out there of what you want**
Do you have any examples, screenshots, references etc

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
